title: Seconds, Please!
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>How is it? How does my masterpiece, The Hamburger Bread Roll, taste?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Not bad.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Geez~, no need to be shy with me. You can compliment me straight up!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>? It’s nice and easy to eat.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>That’s not what Kasumin meant~~! Something like, “it’s delicious”, or “I’m happy that you made this for me”, you know!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Ahaha, that’s what you wanted to hear, huh, Puppy-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kasumin is not a puppy!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>There there, it’s really good. You did a great job~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Ehehe.... Wait, this feels kind of wrong–!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>It’s so good that I want to eat 10 more.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>It can’t be helped then~~~!! Kasumin will make them right away, okay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
